$interpreted: Roger: ...Koll? Why are you here...? Did I...again...
Roger: ...Four years ago, I was bitten by a monster. Even though I immediately cut off the bitten right arm,
Roger: I still experience symptoms like this from time to time. I was able to somewhat surpress it in the beginning, but I feel like I'm starting to lose it.
Roger: I know my body well. I don't have much time left. At the very least, I should be able to hold on until I make sure my brothers are taken care of.
Roger: However, just in case something happens, I want you to promise me one thing.
Roger: If I'm no longer myself anymore, you will protect Kittyeyes for me, understand?
Roger: You're the only one I can trust... so please. Don't let Kittyeyes get sad or suffer any pain.
Roger: You must allow her to live a happy and fulfilling life...

Model.Text: ...Koll? Why are you here...? Did I...again...
...Four years ago, I was bitten by a monster. Even though I immediately cut off the bitten right arm,
I still experience symptoms like this from time to time. I was able to somewhat surpress it in the beginning, but I feel like I'm starting to lose it.
I know my body well. I don't have much time left. At the very least, I should be able to hold on until I make sure my brothers are taken care of.
However, just in case something happens, I want you to promise me one thing.
If I'm no longer myself anymore, you will protect Kittyeyes for me, understand?
You're the only one I can trust... so please. Don't let Kittyeyes get sad or suffer any pain.
You must allow her to live a happy and fulfilling life...
